price: Isaan qajeelan (Rabbiin) qajeeluma isaaniif dabalee, sodaa isaanii isaaniif kenne.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
